snippet.title: Akira (NES / FC) Playthrough
snippet.description:
Another time, when I was a stupid kid, and I played the BETA translation ROM! X_X
This means that nearly the end of the game the text gonna bug out! Do you self a favour, download the correct IPS file, or if you are a massochistis play the game in japanese, but don't do that mistake what I made! :O The game was based of the anime hit of the same name. This is actually one of the rarer TOSE games that has credits and multipe endings. I played to reach the best ending possible. I recommend to watch instead PsychTsunamiMkII 's playthrough, since he understand japanese, and he played this through I think a year ago or so.

(2014.10.29) BTW... thanks the 4k+ views! Sidenote: the music sucks major shit!
http://www.mediafire.com/download/edrltkzdz1fm6hd/Akira.nsf
